verses.t: Now{G1161} faith{G4102}is{G2076} the substance{G5287} of things hoped for{G1679}, the evidence{G1650} of things{G4229} not{G3756} seen{G991}.
For{G1063} by{G1722} it{G3778} the elders{G4245} obtained a good report{G3140}.

Through faith{G4102} we understand{G3539} that{G2675} the worlds{G3588} were framed{G2675} by the word{G4487} of God{G2316}, so that{G1519} things which are seen{G991} were{G1096} not{G3361} made{G1096} of{G1537} things which do appear{G5316}.

By faith{G4102} Enoch{G1802} was translated{G3346} that{G3361} he should{G1492} not{G3361} see{G1492} death{G2288}; and{G2532} was{G2147} not{G3756} found{G2147}, because{G1360} God{G3588} had translated{G3346} him{G846}: for{G1063} before{G4253} his{G846} translation{G3588} he had this testimony{G3140}, that he pleased{G2100} God{G3588}.

But{G1161} without{G5565} faith{G4102} it is impossible{G102} to please{G2100} him: for{G1063} he that cometh{G4334} to God{G3588} must{G1163} believe{G4100} that{G3754} he is{G2076}, and{G2532} that he is{G1096} a rewarder{G3406} of them that diligently seek{G1567} him{G846}.

By faith{G4102} Noah{G3575}, being warned of God{G5537} of{G4012} things{G991} not{G3369} seen{G991} as yet{G3369}, moved with fear{G2125}, prepared{G2680} an ark{G2787} to{G1519} the saving{G4991} of{G3588} his{G846} house{G3624}; by{G1223} the which{G3739} he condemned{G2632} the world{G3588}, and{G2532} became{G1096} heir{G2818} of the righteousness{G1343} which is by{G2596} faith{G4102}.

By faith{G4102} Abraham{G11}, when he was called{G2564} to go out{G1831} into{G1519} a place{G3588} which{G3739} he should after{G3195} receive{G2983} for{G1519} an inheritance{G2817}, obeyed{G5219}; and{G2532} he went out{G1831}, not{G3361} knowing{G1987} whither{G4226} he went{G2064}.

By faith{G4102} he sojourned{G3939} in{G1519} the land{G3588} of promise{G3588}, as{G5613} in a strange country{G245}, dwelling{G2730} in{G1722} tabernacles{G4633} with{G3326} Isaac{G2464} and{G2532} Jacob{G2384}, the heirs with him{G4789} of the{G3588} same{G846} promise{G1860}:
For{G1063} he looked for{G1551} a city{G4172} which hath{G2192} foundations{G3588}, whose{G3739} builder{G5079} and{G2532} maker{G1217} is God{G3588}.

Through faith{G4102} also{G2532} Sara{G4564} herself{G846} received{G2983} strength{G1411} to{G1519} conceive{G2602} seed{G4690}, and{G2532} was delivered of a child{G5088} when she was past{G3844} age{G2244}, because{G1893} she judged{G2233} him{G1861} faithful{G4103} who had promised{G1861}.

Therefore{G1352} sprang there{G1080} even{G2532} of{G575} one{G1520}, and{G2532} him{G5023} as good as dead{G3499}, so many as{G2531} the stars{G3588}of the sky{G3588} in multitude{G3588}, and{G2532} as{G5616} the sand{G285} which is{G3588} by{G3844} the{G3588} sea{G3588} shore{G5491} innumerable{G382}.

These{G3778} all{G3956} died{G599} in{G2596} faith{G4102}, not{G3361} having received{G2983} the promises{G3588}, but{G235} having seen{G1492} them{G846} afar off{G4207}, and{G2532} were persuaded of{G3982} them, and{G2532} embraced{G782} them, and{G2532} confessed{G3670} that{G3754} they were{G1526} strangers{G3581} and{G2532} pilgrims{G3927} on{G1909} the earth{G3588}.
For{G1063} they that say{G3004} such things{G5108} declare plainly{G1718} that{G3754} they seek{G1934} a country{G3968}.

And{G2532} truly{G3303}, if{G1487} they had been mindful{G3421} of that{G1565} country from{G575} whence{G3739} they came out{G1831}, they might have had{G2192} opportunity{G2540} to have returned{G344}.

But{G1161} now{G3570} they desire{G3713} a better{G2909} country, that{G5124} is{G2076}, an heavenly{G2032}: wherefore{G1352} God{G3588} is{G1870} not{G3756} ashamed{G1870} to be called{G1941} their{G846} God{G2316}: for{G1063} he hath prepared{G2090} for them{G846} a city{G4172}.theos theos tagged in correct order?
By faith{G4102} Abraham{G11}, when he was tried{G3985}, offered up{G4374} Isaac{G2464}: and{G2532} he that had received{G324} the promises{G3588} offered up{G4374} his only begotten{G3439} son,
Of{G4314} whom{G3739} it was said{G2980}, That{G3754} in{G1722} Isaac{G2464} shall{G2564} thy{G4671} seed{G4690} be called{G2564}:

Accounting{G3049} that{G3754} God{G3588} was able{G1415} to raise{G1453} him up{G1453}, even{G2532} from{G1537} the dead{G3498}; from whence{G3606} also{G2532} he received{G2865} him{G846} in{G1722} a figure{G3850}.
By faith{G4102} Isaac{G2464} blessed{G2127} Jacob{G2384} and{G2532} Esau{G2269} concerning{G4012} things to come{G3195}.

By faith{G4102} Jacob{G2384}, when he was a dying{G599}, blessed{G2127} both{G1538} the sons{G3588} of Joseph{G2501}; and{G2532} worshipped{G4352}, leaning upon{G1909} the top{G3588} of{G3588} his{G846} staff{G4464}.

By faith{G4102} Joseph{G2501}, when he died{G5053}, made mention{G3421} of{G4012} the departing{G3588} of the children{G3588} of Israel{G2474}; and{G2532} gave commandment{G1781} concerning{G4012} his{G846} bones{G3588}.

By faith{G4102} Moses{G3475}, when he was born{G1080}, was hid{G2928} three months{G5150} of{G5259} his{G846} parents{G3588}, because{G1360} they saw{G1492} he was a{G3588} proper{G791} child{G3813}; and{G2532} they were{G5399} not{G3756} afraid{G5399} of{G3588} the king's{G3588} commandment{G1297}.
By faith{G4102} Moses{G3475}, when he was come{G1096} to years{G3173}, refused{G720} to be called{G3004} the son{G5207} of{G2364} Pharaoh's{G5328} daughter{G2364};
Choosing{G138} rather{G3123} to suffer affliction with{G4778} the people{G3588} of God{G3588}, than{G2228} to enjoy{G2192} the pleasures{G619} of sin{G266} for a season{G4340};

Esteeming{G2233} the reproach{G3588}of Christ{G3588} greater{G3173} riches{G4149} than the treasures{G2344} in{G1722} Egypt{G125}: for{G1063} he had respect{G578} unto{G1519} the recompence of the reward{G3588}.
By faith{G4102} he forsook{G2641} Egypt{G125}, not{G3361} fearing{G5399} the wrath{G3588} of the king{G3588}: for{G1063} he endured{G2594}, as{G5613} seeing{G3708} him who is invisible{G517}.
Through faith{G4102} he kept{G4160} the passover{G3957}, and{G2532} the sprinkling{G3588} of blood{G3588}, lest{G3361} he that destroyed{G3645} the firstborn{G4416} should touch{G2345} them{G846}.
By faith{G4102} they passed through{G1224} the{G2281} Red{G2063} sea{G2281} as{G5613} by{G1223} dry{G3584} land: which{G3739} the Egyptians{G124} assaying{G3984} to do{G2983} were drowned{G2666}.
By faith{G4102} the walls{G3588} of Jericho{G2410} fell down{G4098}, after they were compassed{G2944} about{G1909} seven{G2033} days{G2250}.
By faith{G4102} the harlot{G3588} Rahab{G4460} perished{G4881} not{G3756} with{G4881} them that believed not{G544}, when she had received{G1209} the spies{G3588} with{G3326} peace{G1515}.

And{G2532} what{G5101} shall I{G3004} more{G2089} say{G3004}? for{G1063} the time{G3588} would fail{G1952} me{G3165} to tell{G1334} of{G4012} Gedeon{G1066}, and{G5037} of Barak{G913}, and{G2532} of Samson{G4546}, and{G2532} of Jephthae{G2422}; of David{G1138} also{G5037}, and{G2532} Samuel{G4545}, and{G2532} of the prophets{G3588}:
Who{G3739} through{G1223} faith{G4102} subdued{G2610} kingdoms{G932}, wrought{G2038} righteousness{G1343}, obtained{G2013} promises{G1860}, stopped{G5420} the mouths{G4750} of lions{G3023},

Women{G1135} received{G2983} their{G846} dead{G3498} raised to life again{G386}: and{G1161} others{G243} were tortured{G5178}, not{G3756} accepting{G4327} deliverance{G3588}; that{G2443} they might obtain{G5177} a{G386} better{G2909} resurrection{G386}:
And{G1161} others{G2087} had{G2983} trial{G3984} of{G1701} cruel mockings{G1701} and{G2532} scourgings{G3148}, yea{G2089}, moreover{G1161} of bonds{G1199} and{G2532} imprisonment{G5438}:

(Of whom{G3739} the world{G3588} was{G2258} not{G3756} worthy{G514}:) they wandered{G4105} in{G1722} deserts{G2047}, and{G2532} in mountains{G3735}, and{G2532} in dens{G4693} and{G2532} caves{G3588} of the earth{G3588}.
